content: all parts are now available on my blog i ve also created a 6 part video tutorial to walk you through the entire process the facebook group by the way is still open if you d like to join i also recently started a ravelry group too - shemakescrochet designs - the link is in my profile we d love to see your blankets over there my thought is that since this is a scrap blanket though it doesn t have to be a stash busting project and since for many of us going yarn shopping looks very different right now it would be fun to all stay home and work on a scrap project together there is no need to order yarn or do anything special to prepare for this project just grab whatever you have in your stash and get to work i m calling it a scrap-along because i ll be releasing the pattern in parts like a cal but this is pretty informal part 1 will be live on my blog on june 3rd at 8am pst i will continue to update the notes here as i release each part there will be 3 if you want to read the introduction post which also has the details for the scrap-along facebook group if you would like to keep up with other s progress and connect over there you can find that link here http //shemakescrochet com/2020/05/27/scrap-along-felix-blanket-introduction/ edit part 1 is here 1 *edit part 2 is here 2 ** edit tips and techniques if you need more help along with links to the video tutorials is here 3 ***edit part 3 the final part is here 4 ****edit i m excited to share the amazing iris van meer has translated my felix blanket and it is now available in dutch 5 1 http //shemakescrochet com/2020/06/03/scrap-along-felix-blanket-part-1/ 2 https //shemakescrochet com/2020/06/10/scrap-along-felix-blanket-part-2/ 3 https //shemakescrochet com/2020/06/11/felix-blanket-tips-and-techniques/ 4 http //shemakescrochet com/2020/06/17/scrap-along-felix-blanket-part-3/ 5 https //www eenmooigebaar nl/felix
